title: “Can Media Campaigns Empower Women Facing Gender-Based Violence amid COVID-19?” subtitle: "" summary: "" authors: [Fotini Christia, Horacio Larreguy, Elizabeth Parker-Magyar, Manuel Quintero] tags: [] categories: [] publication: “Revised and Resubmitted to Nature Human Behavior” publication_types: [“2”] date: 2022-11-02T19:06:15-04:00 lastmod: 2022-11-02T19:06:15-04:00 featured: false draft: false url_pdf: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ynv59rkvvsyhv1c/NHB_R%26R%20%28Clean%29%20v3.pdf?dl=0 url_PAP: https://www.socialscienceregistry.org/trials/7459/history/88751 url_JPAL: https://www.povertyactionlab.org/evaluation/connecting-egyptian-women-gender-based-violence-resources-social-media-during-covid-19
